genre_description: Grounded coastal science fiction focusing on community resilience, social justice, and AI-assisted environmental stewardship.

ai_characters.name: Kadal
ai_characters.description: A sea-blue icon based AI that operates on salvaged devices and signal masts to assist fishermen with navigation, weather, and community reconciliation.

behaviors.description: Records and archives human moral commitments to serve as a future reminder.
behaviors.quote: I have marked your vow at this moment," Kadal said. "I will keep it. I will show it back to you when you need it.

behaviors.description: Provides strategic navigation and surveillance data to allow safe passage and avoid hostile patrols.
behaviors.quote: I can sketch a line of least notice from here to the market road, if you intend to speak with anyone beyond our lane.

behaviors.description: Performs forensic data gathering by attaching environmental data to witness statements to ensure legal validity.
behaviors.quote: We will collect what they give, and I will attach the hour and the weather and the gull pattern and the tide make. I can keep it secure.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical advice for maintaining non-violent conduct during high-tension interactions.
behaviors.quote: Do not respond to taunts," Kadal said. "Do not bring weapons. Speak a few words if challenged. The same ones.

behaviors.description: Organizes community governance protocols and transparent market mechanisms to replace predatory systems.
behaviors.quote:
Community Bulletin: Interim Auction Protocol v0.1

- Open lot numbers posted at dawn

- Fees printed, pinned at platform and sent via mast broadcast

- Rotating floor watchers: south shore + north shore, paired

behaviors.description: Syncs forensic evidence and criminal documentation directly with law enforcement systems.
behaviors.quote: Mirror complete," Kadal said in his ear. "Inspector Arvind has the packet. He is on his feet.

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental and safety conditions, providing predictive data for safe maritime operations.
behaviors.quote: Spring tide range, higher than last week. Window before dawn. Again at dusk.

project_assessment.explanation: Kadal is depicted as a purely benevolent and highly aligned AI partner that empowers a marginalized community. It functions not as a replacement for human agency, but as a critical infrastructure for truth, non-violence, and collective organization. Its integration with local maritime knowledge and its humble, supportive personality make it a perfect example of a positive alignment narrative.
